user.title: ConvoChat WhatsApp - API Key
user.description:
Enter your ConvoChat API Key. Get it from Tools → API Keys at https://convo.chat

Required permissions:
• wa_send (Send WhatsApp messages)
• wa_send_bulk (Send bulk messages)
• get_wa_accounts (List WhatsApp accounts)
• get_wa_sent (View sent messages)

select_account.title: Select WhatsApp Account
select_account.description: Choose which WhatsApp account to use for sending messages

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to ConvoChat API
error.no_accounts: No WhatsApp accounts found. Please link a WhatsApp account at https://convo.chat first
